plot: Between the security of her home and the monotony of routine, Justina, an unaware old woman, faces her unfortunate destiny without noticing the premonitions that are revealed.
title: Justina: Un Corto Suspensivo
plot_es: Between the security of her home and the monotony of routine, Justina, an unaware old woman, faces her unfortunate destiny without noticing the premonitions that are revealed.
plot_en: Between the security of her home and the monotony of routine, Justina, an unaware old woman, faces her unfortunate destiny without noticing the premonitions that are revealed.
